scripts.build: yarn run build:deps && yarn run build:cpp && yarn run build:py && yarn run freeze
scripts.build:deps: cross-var pipenv run conan install . -if build -s build_type=$npm_package_config_buildtype --build missing
scripts.build:cpp: cross-var pipenv run python python/build.py --build_type $npm_package_config_buildtype -l $npm_package_config_loglevel --arch $npm_package_config_arch --runtime $npm_package_config_runtime --node_version $npm_package_config_node --electron_version $npm_package_config_electron make
scripts.build:py: cd python && rimraf dist/* && cross-var pipenv run python setup.py clean --all && cross-var pipenv run python setup.py bdist_wheel
scripts.freeze: cross-var pipenv run python python/build.py --build_type $npm_package_config_buildtype -l $npm_package_config_loglevel --arch $npm_package_config_arch --runtime $npm_package_config_runtime --node_version $npm_package_config_node --electron_version $npm_package_config_electron freeze
scripts.configure: cross-var pipenv run python python/build.py --build_type $npm_package_config_buildtype -l $npm_package_config_loglevel --arch $npm_package_config_arch --runtime $npm_package_config_runtime --node_version $npm_package_config_node --electron_version $npm_package_config_electron configure
